description:
Zoro`s day takes a turn for the crazy when his search for a new sword is derailed by a couple of meddling orphans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha wa Tsuyoshi! Zoro no Dotabata Kaji Tetsudai
Mothers Are Strong! Zoro`s Hectic Household Chores
Une mama qui a de la poigne ! Zoro la nounou se met en quatre !
母は強し! ゾロのドタバタ家事手伝い
